alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 12:32AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ellis, eastern Roger Mills, western Custer, western Dewey, northern Harmon, northwestern Greer, Beckham and southern Woodward Counties through 100 AM CST... At 1232 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Harmon to near Strong City to 5 miles northwest of Sayre to near Vinson. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Mooreland, Vici, Hammon, Leedey, Carter, Camargo, Willow, Sharon, Mutual, Strong City, Delhi, Vinson, Angora, Moorewood, Harmon, Roll and Madge. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 9 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills; Woodward
